attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
No money should be given to persons who need state help other than those who are definitely unable to work due to disability and also pensioners. 

Single parents and other persons out of work should be provided with a reasonable basic standard of living accomodation and food/milk tokens and child care if needed.

If they are fit to work they should be used for work such as helping to clean graffiti, litter clearing etc for which they would be given spending money.

Maybe this would encourage people to get off their backsides and work and also make sure that children get the food they deserve and give those who are fed up supporting them a break.
